#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int d1[5005][5005],d2[5005][5005];
int a[5005];
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int i,j;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    int len ;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(a[i] < a[i+1])d2[i][i+1] = 1;
        else if(a[i] > a[i+1])d1[i][i+1] = 1;
    }
    for(len=2;len<=n-1;len++)
    {
        for(i=1;i+len<=n;i++)
        {
            j = i+len;
            int fir,sec;
            fir = 0;
            sec = d1[i][j-1];
            if(a[i] > a[j]){
                fir = 1 + d2[i+1][j];
            }
            d1[i][j] = max(fir,sec);
            fir = 0;
            if(a[j] > a[i])fir = 1 + d1[i][j-1];
            sec = d2[i+1][j];
            d2[i][j] = max(fir,sec);
        }
    }
   /* printf("forward\n");
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            printf("%d ",d1[i][j]);
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    printf("backward\n");
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            printf("%d ",d2[i][j]);
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    */
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    printf("%d ",max(d1[i][n],d2[1][i]));
}
